BG_Text.text:
背景设置(Background Settings)

自定义背景，以及背景的填充方式

video_Text.text:
视频设置(Video Settings)

目前处于测试状态的功能，有所欠缺请见谅，具体说明详见创意工坊。

video_funcText.text:
-1：上一个视频(prev video)
 1：下一个视频(next video)

global_Text.text:
全局设置(Global Settings)

全局设置，影响音频圆环和时钟

circle_AudioText.text:
音频设置(Audio Settings)

设置音频相关的参数

circle_RingText.text:
圆环设置(Ring Settings)

设置音频圆环相关的参数

circle_basicText.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_opacity.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_colorMode.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_color.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 1

circle_shadowColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && (circle_colorMode.value == 1 || (circle_colorMode.value == 2 && circle_isChangeBlur.value == false))

circle_shadowBlur.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value != 3

circle_isRandomColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 2

circle_firstColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 2 && circle_isRandomColor.value == false

circle_secondColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 2 && circle_isRandomColor.value == false

circle_isChangeBlur.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 2

circle_coordinateText.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_offsetX.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_offsetY.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_isClickOffset.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

bars_barsText.text:
条形设置(Bars Settings)

设置音频条形相关的参数

bars_firstColor.condition: (bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 2 == true && bars_isRandomColor.value == false

bars_secondColor.condition: (bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 2 && bars_isRandomColor.value == false

date_Text.text:
日期设置(Date Settings)

设置日期相关的参数

date_shadowColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && date_isDate.value == true && (date_colorMode.value == 1 || (date_colorMode.value == 2 && date_isChangeBlur.value == false))

date_firstColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && date_isDate.value == true && date_colorMode.value == 2 && date_isRandomColor.value == false

date_secondColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && date_isDate.value == true && date_colorMode.value == 2 && date_isRandomColor.value == false

particles_Text.text:
粒子设置(Particles Settings)

设置粒子相关的参数

title: [4K]Audio Visualizer(自定义背景&音频可视化&70国日期语言&粒子特效系统)
